Title: Devmil MVVM
Description: A toolset for MVVM development with focus on INotifyPropertyChanged and dependencies
HomeWiki:
Devmil MVVM

A toolset for MVVM development with focus on INotifyPropertyChanged and dependencies


Devmil MVVM is a project that hosts utilities for developing using the MVVM pattern.

Currently the project constists of two parts:
  • Safe property name passing for INotifyPropertyChanged handling
Lambda expressions are used to pass the changed property to get compiler checking and rename support.
  • Dependency tracking of INotifyPropertyChanged properties
Properties that use other properties to calculate their result get automatically notified if the calculation source changes its value. No need to track these dependencies manually.

Supported technologies
  1. WPF
  2. Silverlight
  3. Silverlight for Windows Phone

Contribution
Feel free to contribute! Any contributors are welcome.
